articles.description: Edtech unicorn BYJU’S has acquired US-based startup Epic for a whopping $500 million. The edtech giant is inching close to pumping in more than $2 billion into acquiring startups. Here is a look at its top acquisitions and likely future ones.
articles.content: On Wednesday, Bengaluru-based edtech unicorn BYJUS announced that it had acquired US-based startup Epic, a digital reading platform for children aged 12 and under, for $500 million. Between 2020 and … [+4171 chars]
